    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thunderbird Tuft](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1011)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell (add 1 action)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a [_shocking grasp_](/Spells.aspx?ID=283) spell, _thunderbird tuft_ funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-[reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) melee weapon attack takes the listed electricity damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The nimbus deals 1d4 electricity damage, or 1d6 electricity damage if the creature is using a metal weapon, but the nimbus only lasts 1 round, rather than the full minute.
